newsitem.title: USA: Capstone Pharmacy buys Clinical Care.
newsitem.headline: Capstone Pharmacy buys Clinical Care.

text.p: Capstome Pharmacy Services Inc said Tuesday it had acquired Clinical Care Health Care Services for an undisclosed amount.

Clinical Care, comprised of two independent entities operating under one name, provides institutional pharmacy services in California to 20,000 residents in the Los Angeles and San Diego areas in skilled nursing facilities, assisted living facilities and other institutional health care settings.
Along with the recent acquisition of Alger Health Services in San Francisco, Capstone will serve about 32,000 beds and have revenues of over $60 million in the state of California, the company said.
